/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the lush greenery. The image is taken from a distance, allowing for a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
